got everything downloaded and burned to a disk and need an activation code. does anyone know where I can find it

Go to the burned disk and open it (right mouse click on the bruned disk at my computer). Then you'll see a fairlight file, open it and copy everything there to the file where the game is installed (usually in the C: driver). My two cents...
